articles.author: Simon Bajkowski
articles.title: Man City have turned major weakness into their biggest strength - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City are not known for having a Plan B, but moving away from their pursuit of Plan A has helped them
articles.content:
At last, Bayern Munich had the goal they had craved all night.
Thomas Tuchel's side had huffed and puffed ferociously at the City door all evening from the first whistle, although it was testament t… [+2422 chars]
